          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Vill/vill ha</string>
            <string language="en">Wants to/wants to have</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wünscht to/wants haben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Veut que to/wants ait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quer to/wants ter</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Quisiera que to/wants tuviera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Välj rätt alternativ av vill/vill ha.Modul 6 - Vad vill du? - Grammatik 6.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Choose correct alternative of wants to/want to have.

Module 6 - what wants to you? - grammar 6.

Safir.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">Safir</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wählen Sie korrekte Alternative von wünscht 
to/want zu have.Module 6 - was wünscht zu Ihnen? - Grammatik 
6.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choisissez l'alternative correcte de veut to/want
à have.Module 6 - que veut à vous ? - grammaire 6.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escolha a alternativa correta de quer to/want a 
have.Module 6 - que lhe quer? - gramática 6.Safir.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Scelga l'alternativa corretta di desidera to/want 
a have.Module 6 - che cosa desidera a voi? - grammatica 6.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλέξτε ότι η σωστή εναλλακτική λύση θέλει/ανάγκη 
για να έχει την ενότητα 6 - τι θέλει σε σας; - γραμματική 
6.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Elija el alternativa correcto de desea to/want a
have.Module 6 - qué desea a usted? - gramática 6.Safir.</string>
